start.text: Like lightning, man, I'm here and ready to strike.

retreat.text: Damn. See you on the flip side.

engaged.text: This is what a can of whoop-ass sounds like!

need_help.text: Don't nobody know my trouble but God.

pursuing.text: You about to test the strength of my pimp hand!

hull_90.text: Bring it on. I wanna kick some ass.
Your ass is on my platter, snapperhead.

hull_50.text: This is when I'm at my best!
I'm real messed up and that ain't no jive.

overload.text: Burning, man! I'm not seeing nothing!

victory.text: Time to chill out and relax.
Every last one done checked out permanent.
